item.title: Using aircrack to get wifi password
item.description: It’s Thursday evening and I can’t think of something to do. So, decided to write about cracking my own wifi using airmon/aircrack. I had a README written long time ago, so i had to clean it up and publish. first, we need to know the network interface, lets call it intf. We need to switch the interface to monitoring mode (if hardware supports of course). sudo airmon-ng start intf The above command will remove that interface and add another with adding mon at the end.
